verses.esv:
9   The heart is deceitful above all things,
    and desperately sick;
    who can understand it?
verses.kjv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it?
verses.niv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things and beyond cure. Who can understand it?

verses.esv: 34 For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
verses.kjv: 34 For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
verses.niv: 34 For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.

verses.esv:
5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
6   In all your ways acknowledge him,
    and he will make straight your paths.
7   Be not wise in your own eyes;
    fear the LORD, and turn away from evil.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. 6 In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths. 7 Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the LORD, and depart from evil.
verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; 6 in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight. 7 Do not be wise in your own eyes; fear the LORD and shun evil.

verses.esv: 19 For out of the heart come evil thoughts, murder, adultery, sexual immorality, theft, false witness, slander.
verses.kjv: 19 For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts, murders, adulteries, fornications, thefts, false witness, blasphemies:
verses.niv: 19 For out of the heart come evil thoughts, murder, adultery, sexual immorality, theft, false testimony, slander.

verses.esv:
4   Delight yourself in the LORD,
    and he will give you the desires of your heart.
verses.kjv: 4 Delight thyself also in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
verses.niv: 4 Delight yourself in the LORD and he will give you the desires of your heart.

verses.esv:
23   Keep your heart with all vigilance,
    for from it flow the springs of life.
verses.kjv: 23 Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.
verses.niv: 23 Above all else, guard your heart, for it is the wellspring of life.

verses.esv:
26   Whoever trusts in his own mind is a fool,
    but he who walks in wisdom will be delivered.
verses.kjv: 26 He that trusteth in his own heart is a fool: but whoso walketh wisely, he shall be delivered.
verses.niv: 26 He who trusts in himself is a fool, but he who walks in wisdom is kept safe.

verses.esv: 10 For with the heart one believes and is justified, and with the mouth one confesses and is saved.
verses.kjv: 10 For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation.
verses.niv: 10 For it is with your heart that you believe and are justified, and it is with your mouth that you confess and are saved.

verses.esv:
26   My flesh and my heart may fail,
    but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.
verses.kjv: 26 My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
verses.niv: 26 My flesh and my heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.

verses.esv: 9 Rejoice, O young man, in your youth, and let your heart cheer you in the days of your youth. Walk in the ways of your heart and the sight of your eyes. But know that for all these things God will bring you into judgment.
verses.kjv: 9 Rejoice, O young man, in thy youth; and let thy heart cheer thee in the days of thy youth, and walk in the ways of thine heart, and in the sight of thine eyes: but know thou, that for all these things God will bring thee into judgment.
verses.niv: 9 Be happy, young man, while you are young, and let your heart give you joy in the days of your youth. Follow the ways of your heart and whatever your eyes see, but know that for all these things God will bring you to judgment.

verses.esv: 45 The good person out of the good treasure of his heart produces good, and the evil person out of his evil treasure produces evil, for out of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaks.
verses.kjv: 45 A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil: for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh.
verses.niv: 45 The good man brings good things out of the good stored up in his heart, and the evil man brings evil things out of the evil stored up in his heart. For out of the overflow of his heart his mouth speaks.

verses.esv: 8 â€œBlessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God.
verses.kjv: 8 Blessed are the pure in heart: for they shall see God.
verses.niv: 8 Blessed are the pure in heart, for they will see God.

verses.esv: 5 and hope does not put us to shame, because Godâ€™s love has been poured into our hearts through the Holy Spirit who has been given to us.
verses.kjv: 5 And hope maketh not ashamed; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us.
verses.niv: 5 And hope does not disappoint us, because God has poured out his love into our hearts by the Holy Spirit, whom he has given us.

verses.esv: 13 You will seek me and find me, when you seek me with all your heart.
verses.kjv: 13 And ye shall seek me, and find me, when ye shall search for me with all your heart.
verses.niv: 13 You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart.

verses.esv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
verses.kjv: 27 Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
verses.niv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

verses.esv: 23 Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men,
verses.kjv: 23 And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
verses.niv: 23 Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for men,

verses.esv: 14:1 â€œLet not your hearts be troubled. Believe in God; believe also in me.
verses.kjv: 1 Let not your heart be troubled: ye believe in God, believe also in me.
verses.niv: 1 "Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in me.

verses.esv: 34 â€œBut watch yourselves lest your hearts be weighed down with dissipation and drunkenness and cares of this life, and that day come upon you suddenly like a trap.
verses.kjv: 34 And take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares.
verses.niv: 34 "Be careful, or your hearts will be weighed down with dissipation, drunkenness and the anxieties of life, and that day will close on you unexpectedly like a trap.

verses.esv:
13   A glad heart makes a cheerful face,
    but by sorrow of heart the spirit is crushed.
verses.kjv: 13 A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.
verses.niv: 13 A happy heart makes the face cheerful, but heartache crushes the spirit.

verses.esv: 7 And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 7 And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

verses.esv:
19   Hear, my son, and be wise,
    and direct your heart in the way.
verses.kjv: 19 Hear thou, my son, and be wise, and guide thine heart in the way.
verses.niv: 19 Listen, my son, and be wise, and keep your heart on the right path.

verses.esv: 19 And I will give them one heart, and a new spirit I will put within them. I will remove the heart of stone from their flesh and give them a heart of flesh,
verses.kjv: 19 And I will give them one heart, and I will put a new spirit within you; and I will take the stony heart out of their flesh, and will give them an heart of flesh:
verses.niv: 19 I will give them an undivided heart and put a new spirit in them; I will remove from them their heart of stone and give them a heart of flesh.

verses.esv:
7   O Israel, hope in the LORD!
    For with the LORD there is steadfast love,
    and with him is plentiful redemption.
verses.kjv: 7 Let Israel hope in the LORD: for with the LORD there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.
verses.niv: 7 O Israel, put your hope in the LORD, for with the LORD is unfailing love and with him is full redemption.

verses.esv: 7 Each one must give as he has decided in his heart, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver.
verses.kjv: 7 Every man according as he purposeth in his heart, so let him give; not grudgingly, or of necessity: for God loveth a cheerful giver.
verses.niv: 7 Each man should give what he has decided in his heart to give, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver.

verses.esv: 5 You shall love the LORD your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your might.
verses.kjv: 5 And thou shalt love the LORD thy God with all thine heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy might.
verses.niv: 5 Love the LORD your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.
